fields.label: Do Not Create or Update Contacts
fields.footerNote: To disable creating or updating contacts during an identify call, set this option to true.

fields.label: Identify Data External Key
fields.footerNote: Use this setting if you would like Rudder identify events to create or update Data Extensions in SFMC. The External Key of the Salesforce Marketing Cloud Data Extension to which you'd like to send Identify data. You can find this in the SFMC interface by navigating to Data & Analytics > Contact Builder > Data Extensions; the extension's name will appear in the External Key column.

fields.label: Map events to primary key
fields.footerNote: The target Data Extension's Primary Key. If a value is not provided, defaults to Contact Key. You can add multiple primary keys by separating them with commas. The primary key names should be same as that you have set in SFMC data extensions.

fields.label: Map events to event definition key
fields.footerNote: Map your event names to the respective event definition keys.

customFields.label: UUID
customFields.footerNote: If this is checked then we will generate a UUID and pass it through to SMC as the value for Primary Key for this event called 'Uuid'. This will override the above Primary Key field.

fields.label: OneTrust Consent Categories
fields.footerNote: The support for category names is deprecated. We recommend using the category IDs instead of the names as IDs are unique and less likely to change over time, making them a more reliable choice.
